医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，虚弱可能会在痴呆症发病前数年预测其风险研究表明，在痴呆症发生之前，虚弱程度显着上升，这表明它可能是早期识别和预防痴呆症风险的关键标志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Frailty-may-predict-dementia-risk-years-before-onset-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Frailty-may-predict-dementia-risk-years-before-onset-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=370b9f51-c35e-4a31-971d-901403afb1d8 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 05:09:00 -0500 Frailty may predict dementia risk years before onset, study finds
比较骆驼奶、牛奶和羊奶：哪一种最有利于糖尿病和心脏健康？骆驼奶的营养成分支持糖尿病和心脏健康，在慢性疾病管理方面比牛奶和羊奶具有更优越的代谢益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Comparing-camel-cow-and-goat-milk-Which-is-best-for-diabetes-and-heart-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Comparing-camel-cow-and-goat-milk-Which-is-best-for-diabetes-and-heart-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e950823-d652-438f-9a1b-2714fb218fb8 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 04:39:00 -0500 Comparing camel, cow, and goat milk: Which is best for diabetes and heart health?
哮喘与儿童记忆问题有关研究结果表明，儿童哮喘与记忆问题相关，这表明早期发病可能会阻碍认知发展和执行功能的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Asthma-linked-with-memory-issues-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Asthma-linked-with-memory-issues-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2489b5ef-078f-43fd-b990-64a1d1472746 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 04:31:00 -0500 Asthma associated with memory issues in children
利用过程拉曼优化养殖肉生产了解过程拉曼光谱在优化生物反应器监测以及改进养殖肉类生产中的应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Utilizing-process-Raman-in-optimizing-cultivated-meat-production.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Utilizing-process-Raman-in-optimizing-cultivated-meat-production.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc903ed0-6b40-4699-b794-d3643b2f83db Wed, 13 Nov 2024 04:27:00 -0500 Utilizing process Raman in optimizing cultivated meat production
干细胞植入物恢复角膜干细胞缺陷患者的视力研究人员成功测试了干细胞角膜植入物的安全性和初步功效，显示出恢复严重角膜损伤患者视力的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Stem-cell-implants-restore-vision-in-患者-with-corneal-stem-cell-deficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Stem-cell-implants-restore-vision-in-病人-with-corneal-stem-cell-deficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a618f2b-5744-4eff-a964-87b08fa038a6 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 22:40:00 -0500 Stem-cell implants restore vision in patients with corneal stem cell deficiency
科学家发现用于阿尔茨海默病检测和治疗的脑脊液标记物研究人员绘制了人类脑脊液中蛋白质的独特基因调控图，确定了阿尔茨海默氏症治疗的潜在靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Scientists-uncover-cerebrospinal-fluid-markers-for-Alzheimers-detection-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Scientists-uncover-cerebrospinal-fluid-markers-for-Alzheimers-detection-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e17b7b6-538a-41b2-9e1b-f4bac6bcdf72 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 22:14:00 -0500 Scientists uncover cerebrospinal fluid markers for Alzheimer's detection and treatment
MassiveFold 通过高效的并行处理推进蛋白质结构预测研究人员开发了 MassiveFold，这是一种针对并行处理进行优化的增强型 AlphaFold 版本，可将蛋白质结构预测速度从数月缩短至数小时，同时增加结构多样性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/MassiveFold-advances-蛋白质-结构-预测-with-efficient-parallel-processing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/MassiveFold-advances-蛋白质-结构-预测-with-efficient-parallel-processing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=213cca03-c4ea-4a4c-a411-62c5f2ae222a Tue, 12 Nov 2024 21:42:00 -0500 MassiveFold advances protein structure prediction with efficient parallel processing
电子衰弱指数经验证可预测老年人的健康并发症一篇新的研究论文于2024年10月24日发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 20 期，标题为“Development”以及在国家健康维护组织中验证电子脆弱指数。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Electronic-frailty-index-validated-for-predicting-health-complications-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Electronic-frailty-index-validated-for-predicting-health-complications-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd9e1df2-7f0d-4ea7-b712-fc179a27bdef Tue, 12 Nov 2024 19:35:00 -0500 Electronic frailty index validated for predicting health complications in seniors
研究揭示了为什么白蘑菇可能有助于预防前列腺癌进展City of Hope 是美国最大、最先进的癌症研究和治疗组织之一，其研究人员被《美国新闻与世界报道》评为全美前 5 名癌症中心，并且在为癌症患者提供最佳治疗方面处于全国领先地位。课程，综合支持性护理计划，现在了解为什么服用研究性白蘑菇补充剂有望减缓甚至预防前列腺癌在参加研究“食品作为药物”的二期临床试验的男性中的扩散。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Study-uncovers-why-white-button-mushrooms-may-help-prevent-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Study-uncovers-why-white-button-mushrooms-may-help-prevent-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69b7e285-1258-4018-9048-b1ff8d5b07a1 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 19:28:57 -0500 Study uncovers why white button mushrooms may help prevent prostate cancer progression
研究为杯状细胞的核心作用提供了新的见解在最近的一项研究中，加州大学圣地亚哥分校的研究人员对杯状细胞（肠道内的特殊细胞）在维持胃肠道 (GI) 内健康和平衡的免疫环境中的核心作用提供了新的见解。道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Study-provides-new-insights-into-the-central-role-of-goblet-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Study-provides-new-insights-into-the-central-role-of-goblet-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a5074ae-711a-4202-8175-e39f5ab79717 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 19:15:44 -0500 Study provides new insights into the central role of goblet cells
